update1.description: New PAN card with QR code feature launched. Free upgrade available for all existing PAN cardholders.

div2.description: The Income Tax Department has launched PAN 2.0 - an upgraded version of the PAN card with enhanced security features including a QR code that contains all your details.

ul2.li1: Visit the official Income Tax e-filing portal
ul2.li2: Login using your PAN and password
ul2.li5: New card will be delivered to your registered address

update2.description: All states to adopt digital ration cards by June 2026. Learn how to get yours.

div2.description: Government is digitizing ration cards across all states. You'll receive a digital card that can be accessed through the Mera Ration mobile app.

ul1.li1: Access ration from any Fair Price Shop in India
ul1.li2: No need to carry physical card

ul2.li1: Download Mera Ration app from Play Store
ul2.li4: Your digital card will be activated
ul2.li5: Link family members' Aadhaar for biometric authentication
